titles.title: Medication Automated Quotation System, or MEDAQ, Act of 2018

To direct the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on the feasibility of establishing and maintaining an automated and searchable system that tracks prescription drug prices in the United States, and for other purposes.
Medication Automated Quotation System, or MEDAQ, Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Medication Automated Quotation System, or MEDAQ, Act of 2018
This bill requires the Government Accountability Office to study the feasibility of establishing a medication automated quotation system (i.e., an automated, searchable system that tracks the acquisition price per unit of prescription drugs and generates real-time reports).
